explanation: [0-0] A little girl is in a clothing store. In the background, there are clothes of various colors and styles hanging on display racks. The walls are white, and there are white spotlights on the ceiling. The little girl is wearing a purple, orange, and white top and pants, white shoes, a black crossbody bag, and holding a blue dress hanging on a hanger in her right hand. The white text at the top of the screen reads: Baba bunu albilir miyiz lutfen....

[0-5] The little girl takes two steps forward and lifts the hanger to display the blue dress in her hand. The video cuts to the girl's parents. The father is wearing a black jacket over a gray shirt, black pants, and white shoes. The mother is wearing an all-white outfit with gray and white shoes that have yellow decorations. Both of them are wearing black masks covering their chins. In the background, there are various colored baby and toddler clothes hanging on display racks. The white text on the screen reads: Klzlm nerede giyeceksin onu? The video cuts back to the girl with the hanger held to her chest, the text changes to: Ben bulurum and a yellow emoji.
